executable.title: [Utah] Deformable BSpline registration (Experimental)
executable.description: Registers two images together using a normalized correlation metric and BSpline transform. This is an experimental module using a specialized BSpline method.
executable.contributor: Sam Gerber, Jim Miller, Steve Pieper, Ross Whitaker
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

integer.name: gridSize
integer.description: Number of grid points on interior of image.
integer.label: Grid Size

double.name: alpha
double.description: Regularization term. 0 is no regularization, 1 is maximum.
double.label: Regularization (alpha)

double.name: sigma
double.description: Standard deviation of image smoothing kernel in mm.
double.label: Std. Dev. of Smoothing (sigma)

double.name: step
double.description: Initial step size of the optimizer (will be adjusted dynamically downward).
double.label: Initial Step Size

double.name: tolerance
double.description: Convergence criterion. Optimization will stop with step size reaches tolerance.
double.label: Tolerance
